user_story: Initialize project folder and add sample JSON files
body:
- Create folder structure
- Add `twitter.json`, `substack.json`, and `linkedin_saves.json`
- Create empty `app.py` to start building

user_story: Load and normalize post data from all 3 platforms
body:
- Read data from JSON files
- Standardize to format: `id`, `platform`, `title`, `summary`, `url`, `tags`, `note`, `saved_at`
- Combine all into one list for rendering

user_story: Build Streamlit UI to show saved posts with platform and title
body:
- Add `st.text_input` for search
- Loop through posts and show in expandable cards
- Show platform, title (linked), summary, tags, note

user_story: Allow users to tag and annotate saved posts
body:
- Add input for custom tags per post
- Add editable notes section
- Store temporary edits in memory

user_story: Save changes to JSON files and enable export
body:
- Group posts by platform
- Overwrite `twitter.json`, `substack.json`, `linkedin_saves.json`
- (Optional) Add Markdown export of all posts

user_story: Test app flow and ensure tag/note edits persist
body:
- Check that search and editing work correctly
- Test saving and reopening JSONs
- Validate behavior with 10+ posts
